name: Vignette Ads
author: CodyCross Solutions

sections.description:
Add your Vignette Ads and Anchor/Overlay Ads code to the header of your website.

Anchor/Overlay ads
Mobile Ads that stick to the edge of the user’s screen and are easily dismissable.

Vignette ads
Mobile full-screen ads that appear between page loads on your site and can be easily dismissed by your users.
Vignette Ads and Anchor/Overlay Ads showing Mobile only
sections.installation:
1. Upload vignette-ads to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Inserted your code in Settings > Vignette Ads
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin to add other javascript codes?

Yes, you can use any javascript code.
sections.changelog:
0.3

Removed donation links.

0.2

Fixed typos on descriptions.

0.1

Initial Revision

short_description: Add your Vignete Ads and Anchor/Overlay Ads code from Adsense to the header of your website.
